title: 服务器玩家放不了红石
author: duoduoduoduoduo
txt_content:
UIL`X{`4(4CEJ_NDQMERU(3.png (18.12 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-3-29 16:58 上传

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
ess 的配置文件中，删去

    # 阻止玩家放置以下方块
    placement: 10,11,46,327

中的数字即可

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 EmptyLava 于 2020-3-29 17:01 编辑 

ess的config.yml内
blacklist:
    # Which blocks should people be prevented from placing?    placement: 10,11,46,327
    # Which items should people be prevented from using?
    usage: 327
把这两行的id删掉

replies.author: 利姆露酱
replies.txt_content: 删除插件essentialsantibuild（这插件我觉得没啥用

replies.author: duoduoduoduoduo
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-29 16:58
ess 的配置文件中，删去

    # 阻止玩家放置以下方块
改了重启了一遍就解决了
